name: WIndwards Castle
description:
Explore the endless rooms and caverns of this Beta version rpg game!

Work your way through every room, discovering new quests and challenges to overcome, while returning back to the "hub" to trade, and learn new secrets in this classical 16bit RPG game.

No external art packs were used, and this game will be free for as long as I continue development.

UPDATES:

Fixed a few crash bugs

Optimised some rooms as they caused lag
